class.name: VisualShaderNode
class.brief_description: Base class for [VisualShader] nodes. Not related to scene nodes.
class.description: Visual shader graphs consist of various nodes. Each node in the graph is a separate object and they are represented as a rectangular boxes with title and a set of properties. Each node also has connection ports that allow to connect it to another nodes and control the flow of the shader.

method.name: clear_default_input_values
method.description: Clears the default input ports value.

method.name: get_default_input_port
method.description: Returns the input port which should be connected by default when this node is created as a result of dragging a connection from an existing node to the empty space on the graph.

method.name: get_default_input_values
method.description: Returns an [Array] containing default values for all of the input ports of the node in the form [code][index0, value0, index1, value1, ...][/code].

method.name: get_input_port_default_value
method.description: Returns the default value of the input [param port].

method.name: remove_input_port_default_value
method.description: Removes the default value of the input [param port].

method.name: set_default_input_values
method.description: Sets the default input ports values using an [Array] of the form [code][index0, value0, index1, value1, ...][/code]. For example: [code][0, Vector3(0, 0, 0), 1, Vector3(0, 0, 0)][/code].

method.name: set_input_port_default_value
method.description: Sets the default [param value] for the selected input [param port].

members.member: Sets the output port index which will be showed for preview. If set to [code]-1[/code] no port will be open for preview.
